name: sharp 透かし合成 最小
description: overlayWith で透かし合成（簡易）。

files.template:
const sharp = require('sharp');
(async ()=>{ const base = Buffer.alloc(100); const wm = Buffer.alloc(10); const out = await sharp(base).composite([{ input: wm, gravity: 'southeast' }]).png().toBuffer(); console.log('bytes', out.length); })();
